answers.answer: Does not really sound like Diabetes to me.  Some of the symptoms are diabetic but most are not.  I am not a Dr. just a diabetic but sounds more like some kind of heart condition to me.  I would suggest seeing a Dr. if at all possible.

I have type 2 diabetes. One major symptom for me was tiredness, and definitely tingling in not only my legs but all over. I've also had about 3 bladder infections in a 2 year period.I'd suggest a fasting blood sugar and an A1C test.Stay well.

question: Hello, I am 20 years old and I am wondering if i might have diabetes. I realize the easiest way to solve this is to go to the doctors. However I have had my symptoms since i was a child and never knew exactly what to get tested for. It could be so many things , but I am becoming more and more suspicious that it might be a form of diabetes.my symptoms are as followssevere dizzyness if I go a short time without eatingvomitingtingling in my legs when i lay down to sleeptrouble with arousal and lubricationfrequent  bladder infectionsblurry vision once in a whiletired all the timeloss of weightdoes this sound like it may be?thank you!
title: I am 20 and am wondering if my symptoms sound like diabetes.
